item.description:
This is an event taking place in Southington on Nov. 10th at an up-and-coming music venue.

https://www.facebook.com/events/513415658668483/

This is the text from event invitation...

President Obama?
President Romney?
Just want a beer?

Featuring "Obama Brew," "Romney Ale" and Live Music. A bipartisan celebration of brew.

Recently the White House released their secret recipe for the presidential home brew so we whipped up a batch (and by a batch, we mean 20 gallons). Come and taste the same beer that the POTUS drinks on November 10th at Asa Barnes Tavern!

$20.00 cover includes presidential brew
21+ event

www.asabarnes.com
Asa Barnes Tavern is located at 2211 Meriden Waterbury Tpke, Marion (Southington), CT 06444.
Take a left off of Exit 28 From I-84. 1/4 mile down on the right.
item.name: Vote for Beer! (Beer Tasting in Southington)
